skill.name: theme-factory
skill.description: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML landing pages, etc. There are 10 pre-set themes with colors/fonts that you can apply to any artifact that has been creating, or can generate a new theme on-the-fly.
skill.summary: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML la...
skill.author: ComposioHQ

security_audit.summary: This skill contains only static markdown files defining color palettes and typography themes. No executable code, network calls, or file system access beyond reading theme definitions. Purely declarative content with no security risks.

content.value_statement: Create visually consistent presentations with professionally curated color palettes and font pairings. Save time by applying ready-made themes instead of designing from scratch.
actual_capabilities: Apply 10 pre-designed professional themes to presentations
Customize colors with hex codes for consistent branding
Pair complementary fonts for headers and body text
Generate custom themes based on user preferences
Display theme showcase for visual selection
limitations: Requires manual application of theme specifications
No automatic theme detection from existing content
Themes must be applied per artifact basis

use_cases.title: Corporate presentation styling
use_cases.description: Apply professional Ocean Depths theme to quarterly reports and client presentations for consistent branding

use_cases.title: Brand-aligned pitch decks
use_cases.description: Use Sunset Boulevard theme for creative pitches and marketing presentations to maintain visual impact

use_cases.title: Tech innovation showcases
use_cases.description: Apply Tech Innovation theme to product demos and investor pitches for modern, bold aesthetics

prompt_templates.title: Basic theme application
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me the theme showcase PDF and help me apply the Ocean Depths theme to my presentation about quarterly sales

prompt_templates.title: Custom theme creation
prompt_templates.scenario: Create new theme for specific brand
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a custom theme for my eco-friendly cleaning product company using green and earth tones

prompt_templates.title: Multi-theme comparison
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me themes suitable for a healthcare technology presentation and explain which would work best

prompt_templates.title: Theme consistency check
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply the Arctic Frost theme to my 20-slide deck and verify all colors and fonts are consistent throughout

output_examples.input: Apply the Forest Canopy theme to my sustainability report presentation
output: Applied Forest Canopy theme with Forest Green (#2d4a2b) headers
Set body text to FreeSans with Sage (#7d8471) accents
Updated all slides with Olive (#a4ac86) highlights
Applied Ivory (#faf9f6) backgrounds for optimal readability

best_practices: Preview theme showcase before selection to ensure visual alignment with content
Consider audience and context when choosing between warm or cool color palettes
Verify color contrast ratios meet accessibility standards for presentations
anti_patterns: Mixing themes within the same presentation or document
Using themes with insufficient contrast for accessibility
Applying themes without considering brand guidelines or existing materials

faq.question: Which AI tools support this theme factory skill?
faq.answer: Compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Works with any AI assistant that can read markdown files and apply styling instructions

faq.question: Can I modify the existing themes or add my brand colors?
faq.answer: Yes, you can request custom themes with specific colors. The skill can generate new themes based on your brand guidelines

faq.question: How do I apply themes to my existing presentations?
faq.answer: Share your presentation content and specify the desired theme. The skill will provide color hex codes and font specifications to apply manually

faq.question: Are the themes accessible for color-blind users?
faq.answer: Most themes include high contrast options. The skill considers accessibility when suggesting themes for your content

faq.question: What if none of the 10 themes fit my needs?
faq.answer: Request a custom theme generation. Describe your requirements and the skill will create a new theme with appropriate colors and fonts

faq.question: Can I use these themes for web design or only presentations?
faq.answer: Themes work for any digital artifact including websites, reports, documents, and presentations. The color palettes and fonts are universally applicable
